text: María Magdalena Guzmán Garza (16 May 1931 - 12 March 2015), better known as Magda Guzmán, was a Mexican movie and television actress. She was known for her role in Amor Bravío as Refugio Chávez. Guzmán died in Mexico City, Mexico from a heart attack, aged 83.Obituary, emol.com; accessed 13 March 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors
